events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and I would like my money back.
The customer issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on their request for a refund due to sizing problems.
Support agent Michael has been assigned to handle the refund request case for the jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m Michael and I’ll assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 85746231. The jacket is still unused and is in the original packaging, so I think it meets your return policy.
Thank you for the info. You can return the jacket using our prepaid label, and once we receive it, we will process your full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick help. I’ll send the jacket back today using the label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. Please allow 3-5 days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
Yes, I have received the refund today. I appreciate your prompt handling of my case, thank you very much.
Thank you for confirming. We’re closing this case now. Please do not hesitate to contact us in the future if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
